import React, {useState} from 'react' import '../components/css/LoginSignup.css' import user_icon from '../components/assets/person.png' import email_icon from '../components/assets/email.png' import password_icon from '../components/assets/password.png' const LoginSignup = () => { return(
{currentPage}
{currentPage==='Sign Up'?
:
Lost Password? Click Here!
}
{setAction('Sign Up')}}>Sign Up
{setAction('Login')}}>Login
) } export default LoginSignup
